short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives yout the ability to start and stop a stopwatch within your browser, without leaving the active page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This stopwatch gives you the ability to count your time without leaving your active tab or window.

It has build in persistence wich will still count even if you have to restart the browser or even your computer.
